name: CanvasRenderingContext2D.filter
description: The CanvasRenderingContext2D.filter property of the Canvas 2D API provides filter effects such as blurring and grayscaling. It is similar to the CSS filter property and accepts the same values.

refs.name: HTML Living Standard
refs.description: The definition of 'CanvasRenderingContext2D.filter' in HTML Living Standard.
